message.body: That's great. I have some bad news though. Kevin got bit a couple days ago. He had to leave to go to Cali the next day for a conference.
I actually got into an argument with him about it. I found out from someone else about the bites. Anyway. He won't be back until Wednesday & it's going to take a couple days to prepare.
I really don't want to wait that long. Which is part of our argument. Anyway. I was hoping you or Avery or Alex might have time to help start the process so we can get Beth back ASAP
I know. It kind of floored me. But I'm not 100% shocked. Obviously the bed bugs are still there. My guess is they can't get to you anymore b/c of your bed bug moat so they headed up.
Anyway I want to get this treated ASAP. I know you have a lot of experience with this. But I wasn't sure if you had an extra time to help or not. Obviously I'll pay you for your time.
Call me when you have time
OK. I'm walking info work right now. But I can call tomorrow.
I worked a graveyard last night. Slept for 5 hours & now I'm back. So tired.....
Ok! Sounds good. No pressure. Just want to know what you need me to do.
